tei:glossList.tei:label: data.certainty
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressing a degree of certainty<rng:choice xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:value>high</rng:value> <rng:value>medium</rng:value> <rng:value>low</rng:value> <rng:value>unknown</rng:value> <!-- data.probability --> </rng:choice>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.code
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressing a coded value by means of a pointer to some other element which contains a definition for it.<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="anyURI"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.count
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used for a non-negative integer value used as a count<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="nonNegativeInteger"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.duration
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values available for representation of a duration in time<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="duration"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.enumerated
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressed as a single word or token taken from a list of documented possibilities<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="token"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.key
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressing a coded value by means of an arbitrary identifier, typically taken from a set of externally-defined possibilities<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="string"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.language
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to identify a particular combination of human language and writing system<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="language"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.name
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressed as an XML name or identifier<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="Name"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.names
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressed as a whitespace-separated list of single words or tokens<rng:list xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:oneOrMore> <rng:ref name="data.name"/> </rng:oneOrMore> </rng:list>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.namespace
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to indicate XML namespaces as defined by the W3C Namespaces in XML technical recommendation<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="anyURI"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.numeric
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used for numeric values<rng:choice xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:data type="double"/> <rng:data type="decimal"/> </rng:choice>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.outputMeasurement
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines a range of values for use in specifying the size of an object that is intended for display on the web<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="token"> <rng:param name="pattern">[\-+]?\d+(\.\d+)?(%|cm|mm|in|pt|pc|px|em|ex|gd|rem|vw|vh|vm)</rng:param> </rng:data>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.pattern
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines a range of attribute values expressed as a regular expression<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="token"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.pointer
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to provide a single pointer to any other resource, either within the current document or elsewhere<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="anyURI"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.pointers
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to provide a list of pointers to other resources, either within the current document or elsewhere<rng:list xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:oneOrMore> <rng:ref name="data.pointer"/> </rng:oneOrMore> </rng:list>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.probability
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressing a probability<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="double"> <rng:param name="minInclusive">0</rng:param> <rng:param name="maxInclusive">1</rng:param> </rng:data>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.sex
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to identify human or animal sex<rng:choice xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:value>0</rng:value> <rng:value>1</rng:value> <rng:value>2</rng:value> <rng:value>9</rng:value> </rng:choice>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.temporal
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressing a temporal expression such as a date, a time, or a combination of them<rng:choice xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:data type="date"/> <rng:data type="gYear"/> <rng:data type="gMonth"/> <rng:data type="gDay"/> <rng:data type="gYearMonth"/> <rng:data type="gMonthDay"/> <rng:data type="time"/> <rng:data type="dateTime"/> <rng:data type="token"> <rng:param name="pattern">(-?[0-9]{4}-(0[1-9]|1[0-2])-(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])T)?([01][0-9]|2[0-3])(:[0-5][0-9])?(Z|[+\-]((0[0-9]|1[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]|14:00))?</rng:param> </rng:data> </rng:choice>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.truthValue
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to express a truth value<rng:choice xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:data type="boolean"/> <!-- <rng:value>unknown</rng:value> <rng:value>unspecified</rng:value>--> </rng:choice>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.word
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressed as a single word or token<rng:data xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" type="token"> <rng:param name="pattern">(\p{L}|\p{N}|\p{P}|\p{S})+</rng:param> </rng:data>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.words
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values expressed as a whitespace-separated list of single words or tokens<rng:list xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:oneOrMore> <rng:ref name="data.word"/> </rng:oneOrMore> </rng:list>
tei:glossList.tei:label: data.xTruthValue
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the range of attribute values used to express a truth value which may be unknown<rng:choice xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:data type="boolean"/> <rng:value>unknown</rng:value> <rng:value>inapplicable</rng:value> </rng:choice>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.bodyPart.div
tei:glossList.tei:item: groups together a sequence of declarations which are used in the definition of macro.bodyPart.main, which is itself used in the defintion of the body element<rng:group xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can put a comma in right place --> <rng:ref name="div"/> <rng:zeroOrMore> <rng:choice> <rng:ref name="div"/> <rng:ref name="divGen"/> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:group> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore> </rng:group>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.bodyPart.div0
tei:glossList.tei:item: groups together a sequence of declarations which are used in the definition of macro.bodyPart.main, which is itself used in the defintion of the body element<rng:group xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can put a comma in right place --> <rng:ref name="div0"/> <rng:zeroOrMore> <rng:choice> <rng:ref name="div0"/> <rng:ref name="divGen"/> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:group> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore> </rng:group>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.bodyPart.div1
tei:glossList.tei:item: groups together a sequence of declarations which are used in the definition of macro.bodyPart.main, which is itself used in the defintion of the body element<rng:group xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can put a comma in right place --> <rng:ref name="div1"/> <rng:zeroOrMore> <rng:choice> <rng:ref name="div1"/> <rng:ref name="divGen"/> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:group> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore> </rng:group>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.bodyPart.main
tei:glossList.tei:item: groups together a sequence of declarations which are used in the definition of the body element<rng:group xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can put a comma in right place --> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="macro.bodyPart.pre"/> </rng:group> <rng:choice> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="macro.bodyPart.div"/> </rng:group> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="macro.bodyPart.div0"/> </rng:group> <rng:group> <!-- this <group> exists just so odd2dtd can get parens in right place --> <rng:ref name="macro.bodyPart.div1"/> </rng:group> </rng:choice> </rng:group>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.bodyPart.pre
tei:glossList.tei:item: groups together a sequence of declarations which are used in the definition of macro.bodyPart.main, which is itself used in the defintion of the body element<rng:zeroOrMore xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:ref name="divGen"/> <rng:zeroOrMore> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:zeroOrMore> </rng:zeroOrMore>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.component
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the set of component-level elements for use with the mixed or general base; these are elements which can appear directly within text bodies or text divisions. <rng:ref xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" name="model.common"/><rng:ref xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" name="mix.drama"/><rng:ref xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" name="mix.spoken"/><rng:ref xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0" name="mix.dictionaries"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.componentSeq
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines a sequence of component-level elements (such as paragraphs or lists) which can occur directly within text divisions and in similar positions.<rng:zeroOrMore xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:choice> <rng:group> <rng:ref name="macro.component"/> </rng:group> <rng:group> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:group> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.fileDescPart
tei:glossList.tei:item: groups elements which occur inside fileDesc and biblFull<rng:group xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:ref name="titleStmt"/> <rng:optional> <rng:ref name="editionStmt"/> </rng:optional> <rng:optional> <rng:ref name="extent"/> </rng:optional> <rng:ref name="publicationStmt"/> <rng:optional> <rng:ref name="seriesStmt"/> </rng:optional> <rng:optional> <rng:ref name="notesStmt"/> </rng:optional> </rng:group>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.glossSeq
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines a sequence of descriptive or identifying elements which characterize a markup object.<rng:group xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:optional><rng:ref name="altIdent"/></rng:optional> <rng:zeroOrMore><rng:ref name="equiv"/></rng:zeroOrMore> <rng:zeroOrMore><rng:ref name="gloss"/></rng:zeroOrMore> <rng:zeroOrMore><rng:ref name="desc"/></rng:zeroOrMore> </rng:group>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.paraContent
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the content of paragraphs and similar elements.<rng:zeroOrMore xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:choice> <rng:text/> <rng:ref name="model.gLike"/> <rng:ref name="model.phrase"/> <rng:ref name="model.inter"/> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.phraseSeq
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines a sequence of character data and phrase-level elements.<rng:zeroOrMore xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <!-- <rng:ref name="macro.phrasegroup"/>--> <rng:choice> <rng:text/> <rng:ref name="model.gLike"/> <rng:ref name="model.phrase"/> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.schemapattern
tei:glossList.tei:item: A pattern to match elements from the chosen schema language<rng:text xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"/>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.specialPara
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines the content model of elements such as notes or list items, which either contain a series of component-level elements or else have the same structure as a paragraph, containing a series of phrase-level and inter-level elements.<rng:zeroOrMore xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:choice> <rng:text/> <rng:ref name="model.gLike"/> <rng:ref name="model.phrase"/> <rng:ref name="model.inter"/> <rng:ref name="model.divPart"/> <rng:ref name="model.global"/> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore>
tei:glossList.tei:label: macro.xtext
tei:glossList.tei:item: defines a sequence of character data and gaiji elements.<rng:zeroOrMore xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> <rng:choice> <rng:text/> <rng:ref name="model.gLike"/> </rng:choice> </rng:zeroOrMore>
